content: introducing the northstar beanie made with just one skein of wecrochet hawthorne dk this free crochet hat pattern is stylish cozy and perfect for chilly weather the lightweight dk yarn creates amazing stitch definition making it a must-make for any crocheter the northstar crochet beanie pattern is perfect for advanced beginners looking to expand their skills this pattern features a ribbed design and is worked top-down to create a fitted adult-sized beanie in two sizes the written pattern is accompanied by a captioned video tutorial for easy understanding
